channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- Moxa IKS, EDS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- Moxa IKS, EDS

item.title: CVE-2019-6522|2024-09-17T02:32:19.762Z -- ics-cert -- moxa%20iks%2C%20eds
item.description: Moxa IKS and EDS fails to properly check array bounds which may allow an attacker to read device memory on arbitrary addresses, and may allow an attacker to retrieve sensitive data or cause device reboot.
